messages.subject: How I post and what I say
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/15/03 11:17:46 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/15/03 11:17:46 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Yes, my conflict with Sandra and her followers is definitely
negative, but I don't feel it any of it was instigated by me. >>

I think a little more self reflection would be helpful if you're saying
nothing was instigated by you.
And I take HUGE offense to your repeated use of the term "her followers". I
am not a follower of anyone. But strangely enough, people that can post
clear, useful information I find extremely helpful.
You seem to respect Joyces voice, but she's trying to coach you over and over
and over and you are seeming to IGNORE the advice. None of it's your fault.
OK, but a really freaky post after someone suggest that PERHAPS genetics or
modeling is to blame for a childs difficulties is not instigating anything.
Yikes.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett

messages.subject: How I post and what I say
messages.msgSnippet: If anyone really cares to know exactly how I post and what I have said on this list, just take a look through the archives.  One could find everything I ve
messages.messageBody:
If anyone really cares to know exactly how I post and what I have said on
this list, just take a look through the archives. One could find everything
I've posted on this group by entering my email address in the search archives
option. Yeah, its A LOT of stuff, and I certainly wouldn't expect anyone to
try to read it. But, even glancing though it is enough to see that I am NOT
what I have been portrayed as. I don't consider myself a negative force on
this group. Yes, my conflict with Sandra and her followers is definitely
negative, but I don't feel it any of it was instigated by me. Reacted to by
me, sometimes OVER reacted to, yes... Defensive, yes. But a persecution
syndrome? Please, don't offer psychoanalysis of me based on my interaction
with a few folks via email. And if you are going to judge me by the posts I
make on this list. let it be an all inclusive list of what I've said, not
exclusive of the conflicts I've had with a few folks.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
